summary: Certified Nursing Assistant with 3+ years of experience in fast-paced environments handling confidential paperwork, administering medication, and providing quality patient care. Skilled in wound care, mobility assistance, charting, and vital signs monitoring. Experienced in home health and hospice care; reliable with strong rapport with patients, families, and staff. CPR/BLS certified; HIPAA compliant; seeking permanent care position in a health care facility.

experience.title: Home Healthcare Technician
experience.description: Currently working full-time as a home health patient care technician; seeking a position in a medical center or office setting with benefits.

experience.title: Certified Nursing Assistant
experience.description: Certified Nursing Assistant with home health care and hospice care experience; proven reliability and ability to establish rapport with patients, families, and staff. Also certified in Phlebotomy, EKG and CPR.

experience.title: Admitting Clerk I / Emergency Room Clerk I
experience.description: Interacted with patients, nurses, doctors and families; supported admitting and ER processes; empathetic and supportive in challenging situations.

experience.title: Certified Nursing Assistant
experience.description: Cared for residents of all ages; helped with daily activities (bathing, dressing, oral care, exercise); maintained room cleanliness and supported patients reading and engagement.

education.degree: Patient care technician / EKG Tech., Phlebotomy Tech.

education.school: Dora High School / Wallace Community College
